faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Antigravity Skills.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What is Antigravity Skills?
items.answer: Antigravity Skills is a platform for discovering, creating, and using AI agent skills. Browse community-tested Skills that save you thousands of tokens, or create your own custom Skills with our AI Skill Designer.

items.question: How do Antigravity Skills save me money?
items.answer: Every AI conversation without a Skill wastes 2,000-5,000 tokens explaining context. Antigravity Skills remember your preferences, tech stack, and patterns â€” so you explain once and the AI understands forever. That's real money saved on every conversation.

items.question: Is Antigravity Skills free?
items.answer: Yes! Browsing and downloading community Skills is completely free. You can also create basic Skills with our AI Skill Designer at no cost. Premium features for power users are coming soon.

items.question: Who is Antigravity Skills for?
items.answer: Antigravity Skills is designed for Vibe Coders â€” people who use AI to build products, write content, and automate workflows. Whether you're a no-code builder, indie developer, or startup founder, our Skills help you work 10x faster.

items.question: What kind of Skills are available?
items.answer: We offer Skills for frontend design, code review, task planning, marketing copywriting, competitor analysis, and more. Each Skill is community-tested and optimized to save you time and tokens.

items.question: Can I create my own Skills?
items.answer: Absolutely! Describe what you need in plain text, and our AI Skill Designer will generate a production-ready Skill with all the right structure. You can also contribute your Skills to the community.

items.question: Which AI tools work with Antigravity Skills?
items.answer: Antigravity Skills work with Cursor, Claude Code, Antigravity, Amp, and any AI coding tool that supports skill files. Write once, use everywhere.

cta.title: Every Day Without Skills Costs You Tokens
